name: Apple Pie
estimatedCost: Tabantha Wheat, Cane Sugar & Goat Butter obtainable in Rito Village.

name: Apple Pie
estimatedCost: Tabantha Wheat, Cane Sugar & Goat Butter obtainable in Rito Village.

name: Meat Pie
estimatedCost: You can use any raw meat or poultry, but gourmet meat restores the most hearts.

name: Fruit Pie
estimatedCost: Swap Wildberry for other fruit (such as Palm Fruit) for different results. Adding another fruit amplifies the healing effect. Hearts and price listed are with one Wildberry.

name: Monster Cake
estimatedCost: Restores 5 hearts during the Blood Moon.

name: Nutcake
estimatedCost: The Acorn can be swapped for Chickaloo Tree Nuts

name: Fruit cake
estimatedCost: Always use two different fruits in this cake. You may switch the apples or Wildberries for other fruits to add special effects.

name: Carrot Cake
estimatedCost: Use only one type of carrot to add a special effect.

name: Egg Pudding
estimatedCost: Add extra ingredients to give it special effects or to increase the hearts restored

name: Mushroom risotto
estimatedCost: Use other or more mushrooms to increase hearts restored. Switch the Mushrooms for Hearty Salmon to get a fish lover's dish.

name: Seafood Meunière
estimatedCost: Use other types of fish or more fish to increase hearts restored or add a special effect

name: Porgy Meunière
estimatedCost: Use only one type of porgy for different effects.

name: Meat and Rice Bowl
estimatedCost: Use different types of meat to increase the hearts restored

name: Vegetable Curry
estimatedCost: This dish only seems to work with carrots

name: Gourmet Meat Curry
estimatedCost: You can use any Raw Meat except poultry to result in the same dish, but this restores the most hearts.

name: Gourmet Poultry Curry
estimatedCost: You can use any Raw Poultry to result in essentially the same dish, but with fewer restored hearts.

name: Monster Curry
estimatedCost: Other additional combinations and effects untested.

name: Poultry Pilaf
estimatedCost: Switch the drumsticks for any poultry meat to restores more hearts.

name: Curry Pilaf
estimatedCost: You can use any number of these ingredients, this is just the best recipe for heart recovery.

name: Omelet
estimatedCost: Add more ingredients to increase the number of hearts restored and add various effects.

name: Plain Crepe
estimatedCost: Add honey to get an Energizing Honeyed Crepe

name: Meat Stew
estimatedCost: Use more or other types of meat to increase hearts restored

name: Milk
estimatedCost: Add extra ingredients to increase the hearts restored or add a special effect.

name: Simmered Fruit
estimatedCost: Use other fruits or more fruits to restore more hearts or add special effects.

name: Mushroom Skewer
estimatedCost: Use other or more Mushrooms to restore more hearts or add special effects.

name: Fried Wild Greens
estimatedCost: Use other vegetables or more vegetables to increase Hearts Restored, or to add special effects.

name: Fish Skewer
estimatedCost: Use other fish or more fish to increase Hearts Restored, or to add special effects.

name: Meat Skewer
recipeIngredients: Any Raw Meat
estimatedCost: Restores twice the number of hearts as the raw meat used.

name: Fruit and Mushroom Mix
estimatedCost: Add other Fruits and Mushrooms to increase Hearts Restored, or to add special effects.

name: Fish and Mushroom Skewer
estimatedCost: Use other or more fish and mushrooms to increase hearts restored or add special effects.

name: Meat and Mushroom Skewer
estimatedCost: Use other or more Meat and Mushrooms to increase hearts restored or add special effects.

name: Steamed Fruit
estimatedCost: Use other or more fruit and veg to increase hearts restored or add special effects.

name: Steamed Mushrooms
estimatedCost: Using different herbs and mushrooms will change the number of hearts restored as well as possibly adding special effects.

name: Steamed Fish
estimatedCost: Use other or more Fish and Vegetables to increase hearts restored or give it a special effect.

name: Steamed Meat
estimatedCost: Use other or more \Meat and Vegetables to increase hearts restored or give it a special effect.

name: Salt-Grilled Mushrooms
estimatedCost: Use different mushrooms for varying effects.

name: Salt-Grilled Meat
estimatedCost: Use different meats to restores more hearts.

name: Salt-Grilled Greens
estimatedCost: Use more or other vegetables to increase the hearts restored or to give it a special effect.

name: Meat and Seafood Fry
estimatedCost: Use other or more Meat and Fish to increase hearts restored or add special effects.

name: Glazed Mushrooms
estimatedCost: Switch the Endura Shroom for a Hylian Shroom or a Stamella Shroom to give it a stamina recovery effect (Energizing glazed mushrooms).

name: Glazed Meat
estimatedCost: Use only Raw meat and Courser Bee Honey to give the meal the Energizing Effect.

name: Glazed Veggies
estimatedCost: Switch the Cool Safflina for Hyrule Herbs to give the meal the Energizing Effect.

name: Fragrant Mushroom Saute
estimatedCost: Use more mushrooms and other types of mushrooms to increase the number of hearts it restores or to give it special effects.

name: Herb Saute
estimatedCost: Use different herbs or more herbs for different effects.

estimatedCost: Use more meat to give the dish more hearts.

estimatedCost: Use different types of meat to increase the number of hearts restored.

name: Mushroom Rice Balls
estimatedCost: Use other or more mushrooms to increase the number of hearts restored or give it a special effect.

name: Seafood Rice Balls
estimatedCost: Use different fish to increase hearts restored or to add a special effect.

name: Veggie Rice Balls
estimatedCost: Use other or more vegetables or herbs to restore more hearts or add special effects.
